verses.verse: אֵיכָ֣ה ׀ <WH349> how יָשְׁבָ֣ה <WH3427> sit בָדָ֗ד <WH910> solitary הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> How doth the city רַבָּ֣תִי <WH7227> [that was] full עָ֔ם <WH5971> of people הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> has become כְּאַלְמָנָ֑ה <WH490> [how] is she become as a widow רַבָּ֣תִי <WH7227> she [that was] great בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> among the nations שָׂרָ֙תִי֙ <WH8282> [and] princess בַּמְּדִינ֔וֹת <WH4082> among the provinces הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> has become לָמַֽס׃ <WH4522> [how] is she become tributary ס

בָּכ֨וֹ <WH1058> She weepeth תִבְכֶּ֜ה <WH1058> sore בַּלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> in the night וְדִמְעָתָהּ֙ <WH1832> and her tears עַ֣ל <WH5921> are on לֶֽחֱיָ֔הּ <WH3895> [are] on her cheeks אֵֽין־ <WH369> has לָ֥הּ מְנַחֵ֖ם <WH5162> she hath none to comfort מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> among all her lovers כָּל־ <WH3605> All רֵעֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH7453> [her] all her friends בָּ֣גְדוּ <WH898> have dealt treacherously בָ֔הּ הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> have become לָ֖הּ לְאֹיְבִֽים׃ <WH341> with her they are become her enemies ס

גָּֽלְתָ֨ה <WH1540> is gone into captivity יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> Judah מֵעֹ֙נִי֙ <WH6040> because of affliction וּמֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> and because of great עֲבֹדָ֔ה <WH5656> servitude הִ֚יא <WH1931> She יָשְׁבָ֣ה <WH3427> she dwelleth בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen לֹ֥א <WH3808> no מָצְאָ֖ה <WH4672> she findeth מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4494> no rest כָּל־ <WH3605> All רֹדְפֶ֥יהָ <WH7291> all her persecutors הִשִּׂיג֖וּהָ <WH5381> overtook בֵּ֥ין <WH996> the midst הַמְּצָרִֽים׃ <WH4712> her between the straits ס

דַּרְכֵ֨י <WH1870> The ways צִיּ֜וֹן <WH6726> of Zion אֲבֵל֗וֹת <WH57> do mourn מִבְּלִי֙ <WH1097> no בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> because none come מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> to the solemn feasts כָּל־ <WH3605> All שְׁעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH8179> all her gates שֽׁוֹמֵמִ֔ין <WH8074> are desolate כֹּהֲנֶ֖יהָ <WH3548> her priests נֶאֱנָחִ֑ים <WH584> sigh בְּתוּלֹתֶ֥יהָ <WH1330> her virgins נּוּג֖וֹת <WH3013> are afflicted וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> herself מַר־ <WH4751> angry לָֽהּ׃ ס

הָי֨וּ <WH1961> have become צָרֶ֤יהָ <WH6862> Her adversaries לְרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> are the chief אֹיְבֶ֣יהָ <WH341> her enemies שָׁל֔וּ <WH7951> prosper כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD הוֹגָ֖הּ <WH3013> hath afflicted עַ֣ל <WH5921> Because רֹב־ <WH7230> her for the multitude פְּשָׁעֶ֑יהָ <WH6588> of her transgressions עוֹלָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5768> her children הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> are gone שְׁבִ֖י <WH7628> into captivity לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before צָֽר׃ <WH6862> the enemy ס

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> is departed [מִן־ <WH4480> at בת־ כ] (מִבַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <WH1323> And from the daughter ק) כָּל־ <WH3605> All הֲדָרָ֑הּ <WH1926> all her beauty הָי֣וּ <WH1961> have become שָׂרֶ֗יהָ <WH8269> her princes כְּאַיָּלִים֙ <WH354> are become like harts לֹא־ <WH3808> no מָצְא֣וּ <WH4672> [that] find מִרְעֶ֔ה <WH4829> no pasture וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> have fled בְלֹא־ <WH3808> without כֹ֖חַ <WH3581> without strength לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before רוֹדֵֽף׃ <WH7291> the pursuer ס

זָֽכְרָ֣ה <WH2142> remembered יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> Jerusalem יְמֵ֤י <WH3117> in the days עָנְיָהּ֙ <WH6040> of her affliction וּמְרוּדֶ֔יהָ <WH4788> and of her miseries כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all מַחֲמֻדֶ֔יהָ <WH4262> all her pleasant things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָי֖וּ <WH1961> were from מִ֣ימֵי <WH3117> that she had in the days קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> of old בִּנְפֹ֧ל <WH5307> fell עַמָּ֣הּ <WH5971> when her people בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand צָ֗ר <WH6862> of the enemy וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> and no עוֹזֵר֙ <WH5826> and none did help לָ֔הּ רָא֣וּהָ <WH7200> saw צָרִ֔ים <WH6862> her the adversaries שָׂחֲק֖וּ <WH7832> her [and] did mock עַ֥ל <WH5921> at מִשְׁבַּתֶּֽהָ׃ <WH4868> at her sabbaths ס

חֵ֤טְא <WH2399> hath grievously חָֽטְאָה֙ <WH2398> sinned יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that לְנִידָ֣ה <WH5206> therefore she is removed הָיָ֑תָה <WH1961> has become כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All מְכַבְּדֶ֤יהָ <WH3513> all that honoured הִזִּיל֙וּהָ֙ <WH2107> her despise כִּי־ <WH3588> her Because רָא֣וּ <WH7200> her because they have seen עֶרְוָתָ֔הּ <WH6172> her nakedness גַּם־ <WH1571> Even הִ֥יא <WH1931> herself נֶאֶנְחָ֖ה <WH584> yea she sigheth וַתָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> and turneth אָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> backward ס

טֻמְאָתָ֣הּ <WH2932> Her filthiness בְּשׁוּלֶ֗יהָ <WH7757> [is] in her skirts לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not זָֽכְרָה֙ <WH2142> she remembereth אַחֲרִיתָ֔הּ <WH319> not her last end וַתֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> therefore she came down פְּלָאִ֔ים <WH6382> wonderfully אֵ֥ין <WH369> has מְנַחֵ֖ם <WH5162> she had no comforter לָ֑הּ רְאֵ֤ה <WH7200> behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עָנְיִ֔י <WH6040> my affliction כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִגְדִּ֖יל <WH1431> hath magnified אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> for the enemy ס

יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand פָּ֣רַשׂ <WH6566> hath spread out צָ֔ר <WH6862> The adversary עַ֖ל <WH5921> Over כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַחֲמַדֶּ֑יהָ <WH4261> upon all her pleasant things כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָאֲתָ֤ה <WH7200> for she hath seen גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> [that] the heathen בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> entered מִקְדָּשָׁ֔הּ <WH4720> into her sanctuary אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom צִוִּ֔יתָה <WH6680> whom thou didst command לֹא־ <WH3808> should not יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> [that] they should not enter בַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> into thy congregation לָֽךְ׃ ס

כָּל־ <WH3605> All עַמָּ֤הּ <WH5971> All her people נֶאֱנָחִים֙ <WH584> sigh מְבַקְּשִׁ֣ים <WH1245> they seek לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread נָתְנ֧וּ <WH5414> they have given [מַחֲמֹודֵּיהֶם כ] (מַחֲמַדֵּיהֶ֛ם <WH4262> pleasant thing ק) בְּאֹ֖כֶל <WH400> for meat לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> to relieve נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul רְאֵ֤ה <WH7200> see יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD וְֽהַבִּ֔יטָה <WH5027> and consider כִּ֥י <WH3588> For הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> I am זוֹלֵלָֽה׃ <WH2151> for I am become vile ס

ל֣וֹא <WH3808> nothing אֲלֵיכֶם֮ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹ֣בְרֵי <WH5674> [Is it] nothing to you all ye that pass דֶרֶךְ֒ <WH1870> along הַבִּ֣יטוּ <WH5027> behold וּרְא֗וּ <WH7200> and see אִם־ <WH518> if יֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> if there be מַכְאוֹב֙ <WH4341> any sorrow כְּמַכְאֹבִ֔י <WH4341> like unto my sorrow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which עוֹלַ֖ל <WH5953> which is done לִ֑י אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> Which הוֹגָ֣ה <WH3013> hath afflicted יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto me wherewith the LORD בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> [me] in the day חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> of his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> anger ס

מִמָּר֛וֹם <WH4791> From above שָֽׁלַח־ <WH7971> hath he sent אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire בְּעַצְמֹתַ֖י <WH6106> into my bones וַיִּרְדֶּ֑נָּה <WH7287> and it prevaileth פָּרַ֨שׂ <WH6566> against them he hath spread רֶ֤שֶׁת <WH7568> a net לְרַגְלַי֙ <WH7272> for my feet הֱשִׁיבַ֣נִי <WH7725> he hath turned אָח֔וֹר <WH268> me back נְתָנַ֙נִי֙ <WH5414> he hath made שֹֽׁמֵמָ֔ה <WH8076> desolate כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> all the day דָּוָֽה׃ <WH1739> [and] faint ס

נִשְׂקַד֩ <WH8244> is bound עֹ֨ל <WH5923> The yoke פְּשָׁעַ֜י <WH6588> of my transgressions בְּיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> by his hand יִשְׂתָּ֥רְג֛וּ <WH8276> they are wreathed עָל֥וּ <WH5927> [and] come up עַל־ <WH5921> upon צַוָּארִ֖י <WH6677> upon my neck הִכְשִׁ֣יל <WH3782> to fall כֹּחִ֑י <WH3581> he hath made my strength נְתָנַ֣נִי <WH5414> hath delivered אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> the Lord בִּידֵ֖י <WH3027> me into [their] hands לֹא־ <WH3808> am not אוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> [from whom] I am not able קֽוּם׃ <WH6965> to rise up ס

סִלָּ֨ה <WH5541> hath trodden under foot כָל־ <WH3605> all אַבִּירַ֤י ׀ <WH47> all my mighty אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> The Lord בְּקִרְבִּ֔י <WH7130> [men] in the midst קָרָ֥א <WH7121> of me he hath called עָלַ֛י <WH5921> against מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> an assembly לִשְׁבֹּ֣ר <WH7665> against me to crush בַּחוּרָ֑י <WH970> my young men גַּ֚ת <WH1660> [as] in a winepress דָּרַ֣ךְ <WH1869> hath trodden אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> the Lord לִבְתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> the virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah ס

עַל־ <WH5921> For אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> these אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I בוֹכִיָּ֗ה <WH1058> For these [things] I weep עֵינִ֤י ׀ <WH5869> mine eye עֵינִי֙ <WH5869> mine eye יֹ֣רְדָה <WH3381> runneth down מַּ֔יִם <WH4325> with water כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because רָחַ֥ק <WH7368> is far מִמֶּ֛נִּי <WH4480> is a מְנַחֵ֖ם <WH5162> because the comforter מֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> that should relieve נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become בָנַי֙ <WH1121> from me my children שֽׁוֹמֵמִ֔ים <WH8074> are desolate כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because גָבַ֖ר <WH1396> prevailed אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> because the enemy ס

פֵּֽרְשָׂ֨ה <WH6566> spreadeth forth צִיּ֜וֹן <WH6726> Zion בְּיָדֶ֗יהָ <WH3027> her hands אֵ֤ין <WH369> There מְנַחֵם֙ <WH5162> [and there is] none to comfort לָ֔הּ צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> her the LORD לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> concerning Jacob סְבִיבָ֣יו <WH5439> [should be] round about צָרָ֑יו <WH6862> [that] his adversaries הָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> has become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> him Jerusalem לְנִדָּ֖ה <WH5079> is as a menstruous woman בֵּינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH996> among ס

צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> is righteous ה֛וּא <WH1931> he יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God כִּ֣י <WH3588> for פִ֣יהוּ <WH6310> against his commandment מָרִ֑יתִי <WH4784> for I have rebelled שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> hear נָ֣א <WH4994> now כָל־ <WH3605> all [עַמִּים כ] (הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> folk ק) וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and behold מַכְאֹבִ֔י <WH4341> my sorrow בְּתוּלֹתַ֥י <WH1330> my virgins וּבַחוּרַ֖י <WH970> and my young men הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> are gone בַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> into captivity ס

קָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> I called לַֽמְאַהֲבַי֙ <WH157> for my lovers הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like רִמּ֔וּנִי <WH7411> [but] they deceived כֹּהֲנַ֥י <WH3548> me my priests וּזְקֵנַ֖י <WH2205> and mine elders בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city גָּוָ֑עוּ <WH1478> gave up the ghost כִּֽי־ <WH3588> While בִקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> while they sought אֹ֙כֶל֙ <WH400> their meat לָ֔מוֹ וְיָשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH7725> to relieve אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> their souls ס

רְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> Behold יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for צַר־ <WH6862> adversary לִי֙ מֵעַ֣י <WH4578> my bowels חֳמַרְמָ֔רוּ <WH2560> are troubled נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <WH2015> is turned לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> mine heart בְּקִרְבִּ֔י <WH7130> within כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָר֖וֹ <WH4784> me for I have grievously מָרִ֑יתִי <WH4784> rebelled מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> abroad שִׁכְּלָה־ <WH7921> bereaveth חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword בַּבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> at home כַּמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> [there is] as death ס

שָׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> They have heard כִּ֧י <WH3588> for נֶאֱנָחָ֣ה <WH584> that I sigh אָ֗נִי <WH589> I אֵ֤ין <WH369> There מְנַחֵם֙ <WH5162> [there is] none to comfort לִ֔י כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֹ֨יְבַ֜י <WH341> me all mine enemies שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> have heard רָֽעָתִי֙ <WH7451> of my trouble שָׂ֔שׂוּ <WH7797> they are glad כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> that thou hast done הֵבֵ֥אתָ <WH935> [it] thou wilt bring יוֹם־ <WH3117> the day קָרָ֖אתָ <WH7121> [that] thou hast called וְיִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> may become כָמֽוֹנִי׃ <WH3644> and they shall be like ס

תָּבֹ֨א <WH935> come כָל־ <WH3605> all רָעָתָ֤ם <WH7451> Let all their wickedness לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before וְעוֹלֵ֣ל <WH5953> thee and do לָ֔מוֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עוֹלַ֛לְתָּ <WH5953> unto them as thou hast done לִ֖י עַ֣ל <WH5921> with כָּל־ <WH3605> for all פְּשָׁעָ֑י <WH6588> unto me for all my transgressions כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבּ֥וֹת <WH7227> [are] many אַנְחֹתַ֖י <WH585> for my sighs וְלִבִּ֥י <WH3820> and my heart דַוָּֽי׃ <WH1742> [is] faint פ
